name: What Lies in the Dark (slantyRJ)
description:
A game made for the quarantine jam. Made solo by me. This game is a survival collectathon game where you have to chop wood, mine rocks, place fires and stay out of the darkness. demons and devils lurk in the darkness waiting for you to leave the light for to long. place more fires to travel around the small map and find all the totems freeing the island from the eternal darkness.

Art was made by me in inkscape

Music and sound effects were royalty free from YouTube and Kenny's assets but were edited by me in audacity

the game was made by me in gamemaker
